description:
The conf.py for the project has what I thought is the right configuration, but even so the Log a Bug link on the Compute API guide and the OpenStack SDK docs on developer.openstack.org are going to log bugs in OpenStack-manuals. 

Source link is correct, bug tag is correct, but the launchpad link is incorrect.

-----------------------------------
Release: 2.1.0 on 2015-12-09 11:33
SHA: b5890b3c36613919338f83c4f59225f424c99cb1
Source: http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/api-guide/source/index.rst
URL: http://developer.openstack.org/api-guide/compute/
title: Compute API in Compute API Guide

comments.content:
The conf.py for the project has what I thought is the right configuration, but even so the Log a Bug link on the Compute API guide and the OpenStack SDK docs on developer.openstack.org are going to log bugs in OpenStack-manuals. 

Source link is correct, bug tag is correct, but the launchpad link is incorrect.

comments.content: Fixed already with change I75d3c068305ad475ba75649e6185741dc511668b . Now you need to update conf.py to use that one and a new release ofopenstackdocstheme...
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaegerandi

comments.content: It's not fixed yet, we first need to update conf.py everywhere...
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaegerandi

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/255729
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/255729
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=a54834df23e26f2255578dffb16fdac023fd495e
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit a54834df23e26f2255578dffb16fdac023fd495e
Author: Andreas Jaeger <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Dec 10 09:34:04 2015 +0100

    Report compute-api bugs against nova
    
    For compute-api set the launchpad project users report bugs
    against to "nova". Users can report bugs using the "bug icon" that will
    directly link to the launchpad project, it currently goes to
    "openstack-manuals" which is wrong for this content.
    
    This variable is used by openstackdocstheme 1.2.6.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1524476
    Change-Id: I08ba11bb1c5388bc4611cea581274ac5d724c8d9
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
